EVNOTIFY_MAIL_SUBJECT: EVNotify - Notifica dello Stato di Carica ({SOC}%)
EVNOTIFY_MAIL_TEXT: Lo Stato di Carica desiderato del {SOC}% é appena stato arggiunto. Con questo, potrai guidare per circa {RANGE}. Thank you for using EVNotify.
EVNOTIFY_MAIL_ERROR_TEXT: La carica si é interrotta al {SOC}% o la comunicazione con l'auto é fallita. Meglio controllare!
TELEGRAM_START_TEXT: Ciao! io sono EVNotify Bot e ti invierò notifiche circa lo stato di carica, se ti piace. Basta digitare /subscribe per iniziare. Se hai bisogno di aiuto, puoi sempre digitare /help.
TELEGRAM_HELP_TEXT: Io posso informarti circa lo stato di carica della tua auto elettrica. Per fare ciò, semplicemente digita /subscribe. Se non vuoi più essere informato allora digita /unsubscribe.
TELEGRAM_TOKEN_ENTER: Io posso informarti anche ora. Prima di tutto ho bisogno del tuo token. You can find this in the app under Settings. Don't ever share this with third parties!
TELEGRAM_SUBSCRIBTION_SUCCESSFULL: Great! As of now I can notify you. Enter the desired value in the app and I will notify you as soon as this value is reached.
TELEGRAM_SUBSCRIBTION_FAILED: Sorry! Somehow there's nothing I can do with this token - are you sure it is correct? Please try to enter /subscribe again.
TELEGRAM_UNSUBSCRIBTION_SUCCESSFULL: I won't notify you again. In case you change your mind, you can enter /subscribe again at any time.
TELEGRAM_UNSUBSCRIBTION_FAILED: Strange, something went wrong with your request to remove you from the notification list. Please try again at a later time with /unsubscribe.
TELEGRAM_NOTIFICATION_MESSAGE: Hello! I just wanted to notify you that your electric vehicle now has reached the desired charging status of {SOC}%! With that, you can drive about {RANGE}.
TELEGRAM_NOTIFICATION_ERROR_MESSAGE: Hello! It seems as if the charging process had been interrupted or there was an error within the communication with the car. Better have a look!
TELEGRAM_SOC: The latest state of charge for your electric car is {SOC}%. This will take you about {RANGE}. Last stand: {TIME}
TELEGRAM_SOC_ERROR: I could not retrieve the state of charge of your electric car unfortunately. This happens often when AutoSync has not been activated in the settings.
